#summary Research goals and status.

= Goals =
The current research goals are, in possible chronological order:
 * Formulate/describe each of the BuzzWords and add new ones
 * Research how all the various BuzzWords can come together 
 * Read more of the related material (from EROS/Coyotos/BitC and E, especially)
 * Look for new concepts by finding more published material or related projects
